#2 — Collaboration

About

We’ll be joined by Kyle Green, Rebecca Leffell-Koren, and Chris Hamamoto, who will each share a perspective on exhibitions as it relates to their practices as designer-educator-researchers. **

What is Sunday Salon? In case you’re unfamiliar, Sunday Salon is a monthly(-ish) gathering of designer-educator-researchers that takes place on the internet. It is a project of Adjunct and started in 2019.
